---
title: "EVRK analysis"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
evrk <- read.csv("../data/lt-covid19-evrk.csv") %>% mutate(day = ymd(day))
evrk_meta <- read.csv("../raw_data/osp/evrk_meta.csv")
```


```{r}
tt <- evrk %>% group_by(evrk_group_title, evrk_group_code ) %>% select(-day) %>% summarise_all(sum) %>% mutate(r = round(100*tests_positive/tests,2)) %>% arrange(tests) %>% ungroup
tt
```
```{r}
tt_month <- evrk %>% group_by(evrk_group_title, evrk_group_code, month = month(day)) %>% select(-day) %>% summarise_all(sum) %>% mutate(r = round(100*tests_positive/tests,2)) %>% arrange(tests) %>% ungroup

tt_month %>% filter(month == 11) %>% arrange(-tests)
```
```{r}
tt$tests %>% quantile(seq(0,1,by=0.1))

```

```{r}
evrk1 <- evrk %>% group_by(evrk_group_code) %>% arrange(day) %>% mutate(
    positive_sum7 = rollsum(tests_positive, 7, fill = NA, align = "right"),
    positive_sum14 = rollsum(tests_positive, 14, fill = NA, align = "right"),
    tests_sum7 = rollsum(tests, 7, fill = NA, align = "right"),
    tests_sum14 = rollsum(tests, 14, fill = NA, align = "right"),
    tpr7 = round(100*positive_sum7/tests_sum7, 2),
    tpr14 = round(100*positive_sum14/tests_sum14,2 )
)
```


```{r}
lv1 <- read.csv("../data/lt-covid19-country.csv") %>% mutate(day = ymd(day))
```

```{r}
top15 <- tt %>% arrange(-tests) %>% slice_head(n=15) %>% .$evrk_group_code
top16 <- tt %>% arrange(-tests) %>% slice_head(n=16) %>% .$evrk_group_code
cmp <- evrk1 %>% select(day, evrk_group_code, evrk_group_title, tpr = tpr7) %>% filter(evrk_group_code %in% top15)
lvt <- lv1 %>% select(day, tpr=tpr_tpn) %>% mutate(evrk_group_code = 0, evrk_group_title = "Lietuva")
cmp1 <- cmp %>% bind_rows(lvt)
cmp2 <- evrk1 %>%select(day, evrk_group_code, evrk_group_title, tpr = tpr7) %>% filter(evrk_group_code %in% top16) %>% 
    inner_join(tt %>% select(evrk_group_code, total = tests)) %>% inner_join(lvt %>% select(day, tprl = tpr)) %>% mutate(veikla = paste0(evrk_group_title, " (", round(total/1000,1),"k)"))

```

```{r}
cols <- RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(3, "Set1")[c(1,2)]
names(cols) <- c("Lietuva","Veikla")

ggplot(aes(x = day, y = tpr, colour = "Veikla"), data = cmp2 %>% filter(day>="2020-10-01"))+geom_line()+facet_wrap(~veikla) + theme_bw()+labs(x = "Data", y = "Procentai", title = "Teigiamų testų dalis, 7 dienų vidurkis, top 16 testuojamų veiklų")+geom_line(aes(y = tprl, colour = "Lietuva")) + scale_colour_manual(name = "Spalva", values = cols)
```
